about.title: About
about.subtitle: Get to know me
description: I'm Pedro, a Full-Stack Developer who also enjoys venturing into many other areas beside web development, such as Computer Vision and Game Development. My main goal is always to get the most out of everything I do and to help people along the way. I aspire to become someone others seek out when they need help or any insight.

In every project I'm a part of, I bring a mix of technical expertise (sometimes not as much initially, but it's always built up quickly), commitment, and clear communication. Whether it's presenting improvements, clarifying requirements, or defining action plans, I'm always ready to move forward, regardless of the technology used in the project.
Let's work together to achieve our goals and learn a lot in the process. Hit me up, and let's get this project going!

experiences.description: At CI&T, I applied my knowledge in a hands-on Full-Stack role, actively developing with Java (Spring Boot) on the backend and React on the frontend. I was also exposed to Node.js within a BFF architecture and honed my version control skills using Gitflow. Besides that, it's important to say that I got in contact with many other useful tools, such as Docker, AWS, DBeaver, and etc.

During my internship, I built a solid foundation in software architecture and development processes, utilizing agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban) and tools like Jira and SAP for documentation and change management.
